alert.note: Alert for Archer (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 23 at 9:08PM CDT until March 23 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Archer County in northern Texas... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 907 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dundee, moving east-northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Holliday, Scotland, Dundee, Mankins, Lake Kickapoo, northeastern Lake Diversion and Lakeside City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
